name: Ultimate Minesweeper: Adventures Unleashed 2022
description:
Are you a Minesweeper Lover?

Here is new Ultimate Minesweeper. Enjoy the vibes of Minesweeper and enjoy unique and diversified themes. Ultimate Minesweeper introduces unique gameplay along with its 4 Adventurous Modes. Start a your adventures! Break the blocks, find the bomb, win the challenges, and secure minimum time score in your Score board. This brand new Ultimate Minesweeper is a fun and challenging puzzle game.

So there you go. Choose your favorite Adventure and begin your Minesweeper journey through endless amount of Minesweeper Challenges.

Features:

  • Adventurous Gameplay
  • 3 Difficulty Levels
  • Score board
  • Offline Gameplay
  • Engaging Sound Effects and Animations
  • Eye Catchy Graphics
  • Latest Unity 2020 Source Code
  • Easy to Reskin
  • Responsive Design
